title: This Google Pixel bug fix could have spelled trouble for all Android phones
description: An independent security researcher has unearthed a vulnerability that enabled hackers to bypass Google Pixel lock screens.

title: Google's Health Connect beta is here to cut down your health app confusion
description: Made in collaboration with Samsung, Health Connect displays health data across six difference categories.

title: Google Play Store ads are about to turn up in an annoying place
description: Google is testing changes to the ways you see ads in its Play Store on Android phones.

title: Going to the World Cup? Get ready to have your privacy invaded
description: Cybersecurity experts have drawn attention to potential data security issues surrounding Qatari smartphone apps.

title: There's been a huge growth in malicious cryptomining
description: Declining bitcoin prices and rising electricity prices make cryptojacking a major threat

title: Microsoft tightening Azure security with "granular" permissions
description: Granular permissions make it harder for hackers to deal damage to users of the cloud computing service

title: VPN usage soars in Turkey after Istanbul blast
description: Several social media platforms were restricted following the attack. Where do these online disruptions fit in recent events?

title: Microsoft Teams will finally let you do that one thing you've always wanted
description: Teams is adding the ability to delete entire conversations to help tidy things up as we receive more messages.

title: The Witcher 3 free next-gen update finally has its release date locked in
description: The Witcher 3's next-gen update will be free to all current owners of the game, and it's coming very soon.

title: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint gets mobile integration
description: Businesses can now fish out cybersecurity threats and gain insight with analytics on their mobile devices.

title: One Excel spreadsheet was the backbone of God of War Ragnarok
description: The devs used a master spreadsheet and a ton of gifs to break down every single moment of God of War Ragnarok.

title: God of War Ragnarok's inspirations come from a surprising source
description: God of War Ragnarok's got some deep gaming roots, as explained by director Eric Williams.

title: What kind of mattress is good for back pain?
description: Different sleep styles require different mattress types, if you're to avoid back pain. Here, experts share their advice on what to look for.

title: Intel and AMD rumors suggest underwhelming CPU plans for 2023
description: There’ll be a Raptor Lake refresh, apparently, though it sounds like just a minimal step forward.

title: This new extortion scam threatens to hurt your reputation and steal your data
description: An e-mail sender may claim to have retrieved sensitive website data, but it's just another phishing e-mail.

title: Australian police and security services are working to defeat ransomware gangs
description: Australia's government representatives say a new taskforce plans to disrupt hacker operations.

title: A VPN isn't just for Black Friday – get NordVPN at its cheapest ever price
description: NordVPN has just launched an exclusive time-limited offer for TechRadar readers only. Here's everything you need to know.

title: Future Windows 11 update will let you stream Android audio to your PC

title: Nvidia’s update on RTX 4090 GPU cable controversy is not what you want to hear
description: Team Green has provided a new update on the situation, but sadly, it’s not the info we wanted – or rather needed – to hear.

title: Stranger Things 5 is shaping up to be the deadliest season yet
description: The creators of Netflix's hugely popular series appear to tease there'll be multiple character deaths in its final season.

title: Adobe Black Friday deals have arrived: save up to 40% off Creative Cloud
description: Adobe has announced a big saving to its Creative Cloud plan, both for users and students until November 25.
